name: Ghosts Of Coffees Past
description:
Made with love for the #CoffeeJam 2018
A small little positive reminder.

To the coffees I forgot,
To the moments I was too stressed out to drink my mug,
To the projects I could have done
To the ghosts of the ideas I could have had
To the coffees past

To all those times I should have taken better care of myself.
